description: You can use the AWS::Macie::Master resource in a Macie member account to accept an invitation from a Macie master account. The invitation to the member account must be sent prior to using the AWS::Macie::Master resource to accept the master account's invitation. You can invite a member account by using the InviteMembers operation of the Amazon Macie API, or by creating an AWS::Macie::Member resource.

invitationId.description: The ID of the invitation that is sent to the account designated as a member account. You can find the invitation ID by using the ListInvitation action of the Macie API.

masterId.description: The AWS account ID of the account designated as the Macie master account.
